Humanity is broken. Every relationship we have, with each other, with the planet, and with God is broken. No set of rules, no law, no religious code can fix this. God became flesh and lived among us with a plan to forgive the brokenness. God in flesh, who happened to be named Jesus, lived among us, teaching, forgiving, healing. He faced a horrific death. All seemed lost, it looked like evil had won. But, strange reports from unlikely witnesses led us to dare to hope, the world had been turned upside down: in death, we find life, in love-hatred is conquered, and forgiveness is the key to everything. Where we thought we needed to reach God through our own efforts, now God comes to us when we are too weak to reach up to God.

Cool, heres a recipe for cupcakes:  500 g butter 2 cups sugar 12 eggs 2 tsp baking powder 4 cups flour 1 cup milk (liquid) 2 tsp vanilla extract Cupcakes papers Cooking Instructions 1 In a bowl cream the butter and sugar then add the eggs one at a time then add the flavor then mix the flour and baking powder then Divide the flour into three add one portion of the flour and mix then add half of the milk and mix add the flour mix then add the milk mix and add the remaining portion of flour mix using a spatula to remove the air in the batter. 2 Line up the baking tray with the cupcakes papers scoop in one tablespoon of the batter in each then pre heat the oven and bake for 15 minutes
